longBusinessSummary: Nahar Industrial Enterprises Limited, engages in the textile and sugar business in India. It operates through Textile, Sugar, and Others segments. The company offers fabrics and yarns. The company was formerly known as Oswal Fats & Oils Limited and changed its name to Nahar Industrial Enterprises Limited in 1994. Nahar Industrial Enterprises Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Ludhiana, India.
